Producer: Amanda Harvey, Bob Yari, Weezie Melancon, Michael Pacino
Production Co: Yari Film Group (YFG), Magenta Light Productions, Sunstone Film Productions, Studio 2050
Synopsis: In 1959, a young Miami journalist (Giovanni Ribisi) travels to Havana to meet writer Ernest Hemingway (Adrian Sparks) during the Cuban Revolution.
Title: Papa: Hemingway in Cuba
